entities.description: Types of important activities such as spending time with friends and family, attending special events at work or school, participating in hobbies and sports, and attending religious services and events.
Reduction in the level of participation in important activities over the past 12 months due to the use of prescription pain relievers.
Prescription pain relievers referenced in the context of their usage leading to reduced activity participation.
Missing a lot of work or school due to the use of prescription pain relievers.
Getting demoted, having your hours cut, or losing a job due to the use of prescription pain relievers.
Getting suspended, expelled, or dropping out of school due to the use of prescription pain relievers.
Failing to take care of family due to the use of prescription pain relievers.
Serious problems at work, school, or home arising from the use of prescription pain relievers.
Arguments or other problems with family or friends caused or made worse by the use of prescription pain relievers.

relationships.description: The usage of prescription pain relievers causes a reduction in participation in important activities over the past 12 months.
An important activity is spending time with friends and family.
An important activity is attending special events at work or school.
The usage of prescription pain relievers causes missing a lot of work or school.

The usage of prescription pain relievers causes getting suspended, expelled, or dropping out of school.
The usage of prescription pain relievers causes failing to take care of family.
The usage of prescription pain relievers causes serious problems at work, school, or home.
